# HUD::SET_BLIP_AS_FRIENDLY

## Summary
Set blip as a friendly or threat

## Parameters
* **BLIP_INDEX** blip
* **BOOL** friendly

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
false for enemy
true for friendly
